(Simplified: 鲥)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 時 indicates the sound; 魚 (fish) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 魚 [ yú ] fish
    • 時 [ shí ] time, season; period, era, age
①(鰣魚)背黑綠色，鱗下多脂肪，是名貴的食用魚。
鰣魚 [ shí yú ]: Reeves shad (Tenualosa reevesii)

鰣字的基本解释

鰣
shí
见“鲥”。

鰣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shí］
［《廣韻》市之切，平之，禪。］
“鲥1”的繁体字。
鲥鱼。鱼纲鲱科。体侧扁，背部黑绿色，腹部银白色。眼周围银白色带金光。肉鲜嫩，鳞下有丰富的脂肪，是名贵的食用鱼。生活在太平洋，到我国珠江、长江、钱塘江等河流中产卵。

鰣字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鰣； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1475第36
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】市之切【正韻】辰之切，?音時。魚名。似魴肥美，江東四月有之。或作?。【爾雅·釋魚】一名當魱。【韻會】通作時。

shad
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shí］
["Guangyun" City Zhiqi, Pingzhi, Zen. ]
Traditional characters for "鲥1".
Shad. Fish class Herring family. The side is flat, the back is black and green, and the abdomen is silvery white. Silvery white with golden light around the eyes. The meat is tender and rich in fat under the scales. It is a valuable edible fish. They live in the Pacific Ocean and lay their eggs in the Pearl River, Yangtze River, Qiantang River and other rivers of our country.

[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] City cut [Zheng Yun] Chen Zhi cut, sound time. The name of the fish. It looks like bream and is fat and plump. Or for?. 【Erya·Shiyu】One is the one. [Rhyme Club] General writing time.
